articles.description: Karim Benzema long rode shotgun to Cristiano Ronaldo, but since the latter left in 2018, Benzema has proven capable of carrying Madrid on his own.

articles.title: Changes to offside rule could help avoid injuries like Patricio's collision - ESPN India
articles.description: Playing through the whistle on an offside call may be rooted in fairness, but as seen in Rui Patricio's collision, it poses a danger to players.
articles.content:
